guild.description:
Here we go again...

![](https://i.ruqqus.com/post/66iv/ee_ubwXLfNg)

*Cabal*: n. the contrived schemes of a group of persons secretly united in a plot - also: a group engaged in such schemes.

*Powermod*: n. [short for power moderator] a person of power, usually a moderator on a structured website, that takes too many unpopulist stances

This guild is dedicated to whistleblowing and preventing powermods and the forming of a powermod oligarchy which would censor opinions and lead Ruqqus into the same corruption that is killing Reddit.

meta_description:
User JosephGoebbels, who got banned several months ago, was unbanned and then re-bannned immediately to change his ban reason.

Original: https://archive.vn/L7VOv

New: https://archive.ph/Wrbah

user's account: https://ruqqus.com/@JosephGoebbels

The original ban was bs and this one is even more bs. Joseph never posted any cp the closest thing he posted were images of a baby getting circumcised which was labeled as medical gore by the admins and can still be found in this site.

If there was an image "sexualizing minors" posted by JG please do describe it so that everyone can know what got JG banned.
meta_title: CM4 unbans a user who had been banned for months just to ban him again and give him a new ban reason - Ruqqus
title: Admins falsely accuse yet another user of CP
